article.title: Top 10 Things To Do In Muscat, Oman, At Night
article.lead_paragraph:
Are you looking for a perfect vacation package, where you can experience daytime attractions as well as nightlife? Well, you are in the right place, my friend, as Muscat is one of the most happening destinations when it comes to its nightlife. This city offers perfect views of the stunning forts, deserts and also fascinating buildings, as most of them are not very high and white in color! 

Muscat is ideal for spending an exquisite vacation with your family and friends. The city never sleeps and it is the hub of entertainment for those who wander the streets at night! If you love to wander around with the night sky above you, check out the **10 best things to do in Muscat, Oman at night**.
article.proposal:
1) Rockbottom Cafe
2) Royal Opera House
3)  Mutrah Souq
4)  Al- Ghazal Pub
5) Mutrah Corniche
6) Copacabana
7)  Left Bank
8) Piano Lounge
article.meta_description: Looking for the best nightlife experience on your vacation? Well, here's a list of things you can do in the city of Muscat, Oman, at night, where you'll have the most amazing time of your life!

snippets.title: 1. Rockbottom Cafe
snippets.description:
https://www.facebook.com/photo.php?fbid=457604741247659&set=a.125579957783474.1073741842.100009944100260&type=3&theater

This is one of the favored spots in the city if you're looking for an amazing night out with your friends and a place to enjoy live music! The Rockbottom Cafe features live music, every night, as well as DJs and a fabulous dance floor, where you can show off your moves and dance to the rhythm of the music! Along with the live music, you can also enjoy Rockbottom Cafe's cocktails, as well their mouth watering dishes to eat! So, grab your friends and head out to this fabulous place.

> #### Rockbottom Cafe
>
> **Address**:  Al Qurm | Ramee Guestline Hotel, Muscat 113, Oman
>

snippets.title: 2. Royal Opera House
snippets.description:
https://www.facebook.com/photo.php?fbid=10155515782266974&set=a.10155515781576974.1073742071.535786973&type=3&theater

The Royal Opera House is one of a kind! It has some of the most astonishing interior design, which makes this place an appealing place to come and enjoy an opera show. The Royal Opera House is an admirable place and showcases beautifully designed marble, inlaid wood and arabesque design. Here you will be able to see many popular names in opera and ballet perform, so check out the schedule online. Upcoming performances include Aida, Cinderella and Swan Lake, as well as several different shows featuring traditional Arabic music. 

> #### Royal Opera House
>
> **Address**:  Royal Opera House, Al Kharjiyah St, Muscat 103, Oman
>
> **Website**: [Royal Opera House](https://www.opera-online.com/en/items/opera_houses/royal-opera-house-muscat)

snippets.title: 3. Mutrah Souq
snippets.description:
https://www.facebook.com/hakanphoto/photos/p.1087785011265519/1087785011265519/?type=1&opaqueCursor=AbpMJnSUfv8gaR8aK4YQ2VTg3Rzvp3lPwh30vpeHibx5jQp2GNhTKeiGNqEO5Pz11g1X4s_GUamIYtWtplZCSY7RhAJLknWXtxNX6H75GfoFlVQARZwAM4XR0VW1jJZIKGQgmkYJwvr0hEMHQDQeFQnq3hVP8UAZidnzjU-_YClQGBXfUaYdtHzrBm9tuRq5Z41Ynpj3cMd9ajLEWfLQofvPGsGN-fUhK7uDhUT66msodK7wYgZWEgmXFME_1NIy1wibVs_Ql88AD8HuWD23Kal4Lybvf_rsragsBoChjL6HgcDezeWgPotAuKqzieQ8z-y-vRsCNHDZ2fzObo3jzVsHuAZRq6Ejh3p9DN8OL4HiARxlf5H0TFOZHALlldg5NwQ&theater

Are in the mood for some shopping? Well, then the Mutrah Souq is the right place for you. Head here if you love doing some street shopping on your holiday or finding that perfect antique! This place is located in the center of the Corniche, in the old town, right on the port side and near the taxi stand. The Mutrah Souq is a typical Arab market, selling Omani and Indian artifacts, some of which are quite fascinating. You will need to bargain at these small shops and they are sure to accept all types of payment, so get ready and happy shopping!

snippets.title: 4. Al-Ghazal Pub
snippets.description:
https://www.facebook.com/PhotographySabbah/photos/a.893018144132813.1073741831.796945083740120/893018654132762/?type=3&theater

If you are looking for an amazing night out with your friends then this is the right place for you! This is one of the most popular pubs in this city and its enjoyed by everyone in Muscat! The Al-Ghazal Pub features a large bar and offers some of the best private lounges and also has pool tables, which are busy most of the time as well dart boards. On the weekend, there are live band performances, as well, for some great vibes! This place is a must go! 

> #### Al-Ghazal Pub
>
> **Address**:  InterContinental Hotel Al Kharjiya Street, Muscat, Oman
>

snippets.title: 5. Mutrah Corniche
snippets.description:
https://www.facebook.com/photo.php?fbid=10209234027958966&set=pcb.10209234030039018&type=3&theater

This place is ideal for a nice walk in the evening with your friends. The Mutrah Corniche is the main port area of the city and stretches for about 3 kilometers (1.9 miles). You can see beautiful gardens here, as well as fountains and beautiful mosques. It is also an active fish market and you can come here to catch a glimpse of the daily catch, not to mention the king's dhow, or traditional Arabian ship. Cruise ships and other boats decorate the harbor and you can find plenty of fresh fruit and vegetables here, too. This is where your bargaining skills will come in handy!

> #### Mutrah Corniche
>
> **Address**:  Corniche, Oman
>
> **Website**: [Mutrah Corniche](https://omantourism.gov.om/wps/portal/mot/tourism/oman/details/!ut/p/a0/04_Sj9CPykssy0xPLMnMz0vMAfGjzOItvc1dg40MzAz8Tc0NDTyDAwINvF19DN0DzPULsh0VAek2Ufo!/)

snippets.title: 6. Copacabana
snippets.description:
This place is now closed. Why not check out Left Bank if you are looking for a drink?

If you are in the mood for some clubbing, then this place will fascinate you! Copacabana is a nightclub, which features themed nights, including Arabic night, disco nights and so on. If you love to hang out with your friends and enjoy great music and drinks, then this is the right place for you! As the sun sets, head to this club as it's a hub for nighttime entertainment!  

> #### Copacabana
>
> **Address**:   Muscat Grand Hyatt, Shatti Al Qurm, Muscat, Oman
>
> **Website**: [Copacabana](https://muscat.grand.hyatt.com/en/hotel/dining/copacabana.html)

snippets.title: 7. Left Bank
snippets.description:
https://www.instagram.com/p/pOpUzDo1dd/?taken-by=leftbankmuscat&hl=en

The name is as fascinating as the place and the Left Bank looks more like an airport lounge than a bar! The cocktails here are the finest and it features a special ladies night on Mondays, which includes excellent drink specials that will be sure to make your night a memorable one. This place should be on your to-do list! 

> #### Left Bank
>
> **Address**:  Qurm Heights Rd, Muscat, Oman
>
> **Website**: [Left Bank](http://www.omanicuisine.com/left-bank-shatti-al-qurum/)

snippets.title: 8. Piano Lounge at Shangri-La's Barr Al Jissah Resort & Spa
snippets.title_with_numbering: 8. Piano Lounge at Shangri-La's Barr Al Jissah Resort & Spa
snippets.description:
https://www.instagram.com/p/BWI_0zGA1UK/?tagged=pianolounge&hl=en

This is one of the most popular cocktail bars in the city! Among its normal drinks, like mojitos and margaritas, there are special Tuesday and Wednesday night cocktail specials and other fun activities to do! This is one of the best places to hang out with your friends in the evening, as you will enjoy drinks as well as some entertainment. A classy establishment, the Piano Lounge is located in the upscale Shangri-La hotel and features a long terrace with a sea view and light snacks as well as a daily happy hour. 

> #### Piano Lounge at Shangri-La's Barr Al Jissah Resort & Spa
>
> **Address**:  Barr Al Jissah Bay, Muscat, Oman
>
> **Website**: [Piano Lounge at Shangri-La's Barr Al Jissah Resort & Spa](http://www.shangri-la.com/muscat/barraljissahresort/dining/bars-lounges/piano-lounge/)

snippets.title: 9. Take a night tour
snippets.description:
https://www.instagram.com/p/BaJWjnVDgtt/?tagged=muscatatnight

The Muscat nightlife is incredibly rich. Since the opportunities for excitement are practically endless, you may run into the issue of not knowing where to start. You only have a limited amount of time in the city, so you will want to make the most of your time there. Why not have a local guide you an provide you with tips and information to help you navigate the nightlife/ Take a night tour where you will enjoy dinner and have a knowledgeable guide tell you about the city's landmarks and recommend places for you to visit. 

> ####Muscat Guided Night Tour
>
> **Website**: [Night Tour](https://www.viator.com/tours/Muscat/Muscats-Lights/d4389-17169P1)

snippets.title: 10. Take a sunset cruise
snippets.description:
https://www.facebook.com/sheesabeach/photos/a.10151455809618080.1073741826.56712683079/10151455810248080/?type=3&theater

What better way to usher in nightfall, than a sunset cruise. If you want an original cruise experience, consider taking a cruise on a dhow, which is a traditional Arabian ship. You can leave from Muscat harbor and travel around the Oman coast. Not only will you witness a breathtaking sunset at sea, but also you will be able to enjoy the view of landmarks, such as the iconic Al Bustan Palace hotel,  and sparkling waters.
> #### Sunset Dhow Cruise from Muscat
>
> **Website**: [Sunset Tour](https://www.viator.com/tours/Muscat/Sunset-Dhow-Cruise-from-Muscat/d4389-6406DHOW)

snippets.title: Have a rocking night in Muscat, Oman!
snippets.title_with_numbering: Have a rocking night in Muscat, Oman!
snippets.description: Muscat, Oman is one of the most amazing destinations you can travel to. Apart from the beautiful attractions, there are many things to do at night, as Muscat is a hub of entertainment! So, don't wait any further, head to Oman to enjoy the nightclubs, operas, as well as wander through the streets of the city, admiring the beauty!

article.guidelines:
##### 1. For listings WITH partner links (getyourguide / viator / klook): 

Category: Things to do 

Tags: things to do

Paragraph Headings: 

- Create a creative and catchy heading for the activity. 

- Example: "North-end Boston secret food tour" should be changed to something like "Indulge in some delicious local fare".

Photos: Not required*

Snippets: Not required*

*Ensure the tour link is copy/pasted in the partner link field for each section


##### 2. For listings WITHOUT partner links:

Category: Things to do 

Tags: things to do

Paragraph Headings: 

- Create a creative and catchy heading for the activity. 

- Example: "North-end Boston secret food tour" should be changed to something like "Indulge in some delicious local fare".

Photos: 
- Include relevant royalty-free / social media photos

- Upload 1 relevant royalty-free image (non-social media image) in the conclusion paragraph to use as the article's main image (ONLY if all listings have social media images)

- Refer to this tutorial guide: http://bit.ly/imagetutorialguide

Snippets: 

- Insert the "Things to do / Tours / Attractions" snippet manually at the end of each listing's paragraph and edit the information accordingly.

navigator.introduction: I love to travel the world because I love exploring. I love to connect with people and get to know about their culture. I am a graduate in Journalism and writing is my passion. Reading books is something I love doing in my leisure time.
